title: Preserving a Central Role for Community Banking
content: For release on delivery  9:00 a.m. EDT   March 20, 2010      Preserving a Central Role for Community Banking         Remarks by     Ben S. Bernanke     Chairman     Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System     at     Independent Community Bankers of America     Orlando, Florida                 March 20, 2010
